dataset_id: Aqua MODIS Global Mapped 4µm Day/Night Sea Surface Temperature (SST4) - Near Real Time (NRT) Data
title: Aqua MODIS Global Mapped 4µm Day/Night Sea Surface Temperature (SST4) - Near Real Time (NRT) Data
summary: The Ocean Biology DAAC produces near real-time (quicklook) products using the best-available combination of ancillary data from meteorological and ozone data. As such, the inputs and the calibration used are less than optimal. Quicklook products provide a snapshot of the data during a short time period within a single orbit.
